pl.polsl.java.lab4.stasko.tomasz.model

Class BoardGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.java.lab4.stasko.tomasz.model.BoardGame

  • public class BoardGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Element of Circle and Cross Game. Describes gameboard parameters like number of columns, number of rows, number needed to reach to win, board values
